[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Parallel execution] [Event ordering] With Block-STM parallel execution, can events from different transactions be written out-of-order causing sequence number violations? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [API layer] [Ledger version enforcement] Do all public API queries through EventStore properly enforce that ledger_version is not greater than the committed ledger version? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Schema migration] [Backward compatibility] If EventSchema or EventAccumulatorSchema format changes, can old event data be read correctly or will this cause state migration failures? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Type conversions] [TryFrom/TryInto failures] When converting events using try_into(), can malformed event data cause panics or incorrect deserialization that breaks event processing? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Type conversions] [ContractEvent validation] Does EventStore validate that ContractEvent data is well-formed before storage, or can corrupted events be persisted? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Iterator usage] [Iterator trait guarantees] Do all iterator operations properly handle errors from the underlying database, or can database failures cause iterator corruption? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Iterator usage] [Seek behavior] Can seek operations on database iterators position the iterator outside valid key ranges, causing incorrect results? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Memory safety] [Arc cloning] Does the Arc<DB> reference counting prevent use-after-free when EventStore instances are dropped while queries are in flight? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Option handling] [Unwrap safety] Are all Option::unwrap() calls avoided in favor of proper error handling, or can None values cause panics? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Byzantine behavior] [Malicious events] Can a Byzantine validator emit events with manipulated sequence numbers, versions, or indices that break EventStore invariants? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Byzantine behavior] [Event key manipulation] Can malicious validators craft event keys that collide with system event keys (like new_block_event_key) to poison event streams? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Consensus validation] [Event accumulator verification] Does consensus verify that event accumulator roots match actual emitted events before committing blocks? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [State synchronization] [Event stream consistency] During state sync, can validators receive inconsistent event data that causes EventStore schema desynchronization? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Fork handling] [Event rollback] If a fork occurs and the chain reorganizes, are events from the abandoned fork properly removed from all schemas? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Database corruption] [Checksum validation] Does EventStore validate checksums or integrity proofs when reading events from the database? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Database corruption] [Schema validation] Can corrupted schema definitions cause EventStore to misinterpret event data or access wrong column families? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/event_store/mod.rs] [Database locking] [Reader-writer conflicts] Are database operations properly isolated using transactions or locks to prevent dirty reads during writes? (High)
